__e: The less I know, the better it is for you.
I'm just saying Dean's better off as far away from me as possible.
And if I can be there for her when she really needs me, then all the better.
If they know we're coming, so much the better. Just what we want.
- All the more reason not to piss him off.
All the more reason why you should have come to me.
That's all the more reason for us to use this time right now while we have it.
All the more reason he needs our help.
Uh, exactly. All the more reason why I should be worth a hell of a lot more.
Which is all the more reason for you to have someone to make you feel better at home.
Yes, you did, which makes me wonder even more what you're doing in my house.
'Cause as much as I love playing the game and the person that I am when I play it, I love being a husband and a father more.
You are king the more so, because you are not my son and i am not your father.
And the better it would be to live, the worse it would be to die.
And every day that you spend here longer, the worse it will be for them when you leave.
All the worse because since you can't feel, you don't even know when it's cold.
Why not? You're the lowest ranking cop here. Go now, so we can get the hell out of here sooner!
I'd do more, but the faster I get enough together For a room of my own, the faster I can--
Just cooperate and everything will work out.
Too slow for us nowadays, because the faster we are carried the less time we have to spare.
And the better we do that job, the less the other 99% think they need us.
Take our show on the road? I'm not ready to get married yet.
But, Strangely, the longer I continue to live the greater my desire to live becomes.
You should be more worried for my sister.
It started on my hand, but the more vampires I killed, the more it spread, like...
